summary: A drifter with fast fists and a gunfighter-pimp with fast guns help a child claim his inheritance.
cast: Bud Spencer|Jack Palance|Renato Cestiè|Francisco Rabal|Dany Saval|Luciano Catenacci|Roberto Camardiel|Franco Giacobini|Serena Michelotti|Manuel Guitián|Sal Borgese|Marcello Verziera|Dominique Badou|Dante Cleri|Luciano Pigozzi|Dalila Di Lazzaro|Luciano Bonanni|Franca Viganò|Paolo Figlia|Raffaele Mottola|Riccardo Pizzuti|Franco Ukmar
title: En el Oeste se puede hacer... amigo
